title: Enhancing Business Practice Competencies: Understanding Educational Technology Programs and Designing Future Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational technology utilization experience and elementary science curriculum instruction experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can describe the components of an educational technology program and its application strategies in elementary science education.
Learners can write a report analyzing learning effectiveness through the design of a digital tool-based project.
Learners can develop future science education scenarios reflecting technological advancement trends.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
